shortIntro.title: What Your Device Needs for Smooth Mobile Legends: Bang Bang Gameplay
shortIntro.para1: Mobile Legends: Bang Bang is a fast-paced MOBA with flashy skills, epic team fights, and enough visual effects to make your GPU sweat. Because of its detailed heroes, skins, and particle-heavy ultimate skills, a decent device is a must for smooth gameplay.
shortIntro.para2: From landing that perfect ulti to dashing across the map, your device’s RAM, CPU, and GPU determine whether you’re a legend or just feeding minions. Stronger devices = smoother skill animations, faster hero response, and less accidental ‘oops I pressed the wrong skill’ moments.

intro: Below are the updated minimum and recommended specifications to run Mobile Legends smoothly on Android and iOS. These values are based on real testing, high-ranked players' feedback, and a few sweaty late-night ranked sessions.

minimum.Internet: Stable internet for real-time team fights (lag = instant tilt)

recommended.Internet: Strong Wi-Fi or 5G for ping under 50ms (or goodbye victory!)

ios_intro: Mobile Legends runs buttery smooth on iPhones due to Apple’s GPU optimization and ultra-responsive touch input, making clutch plays actually feel rewarding.
fps_intro: Mobile Legends is surprisingly smooth if your device can handle higher FPS. Higher-end devices = more buttery skill effects and less 'hero teleporting across the map magically.'

fps_list.fps: 45–50 FPS (Smooth gameplay, minor hiccups in big team fights)
60 FPS (Ultra-smooth action, skill ults look like movie effects)

settings_intro: Tweaking settings helps you hit those clutch moments without rage quitting. Even heroes hate lag!

low_end.title: Effects
low_end.value: Reduce particle effects to avoid hero ghosting

low_end.title: Background Apps
low_end.value: Close everything unless you want lag + accidental chat spam

high_end.title: Graphics Quality
high_end.value: High or Ultra (make skills pop like fireworks)

high_end.title: Frame Rate
high_end.value: Enable 60 FPS mode for buttery smooth fights

high_end.title: Thermal Control
high_end.value: Keep your phone cool or your hero melts into minions

high_end.title: Storage Speed
high_end.value: Keep 1GB+ free for faster hero loading

faqIntroText: Here are some real questions players ask when they rage at lag, missing ults, or random hero teleports:

faqList.question: Is Mobile Legends heavy on devices?
faqList.answer: Not too heavy, but lots of heroes + flashy skills can cause older devices to stutter in team fights.

faqList.question: Can Mobile Legends run at 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes! On mid-range and high-end devices with good GPU support, your skills will feel silky smooth.

faqList.question: Why does my hero teleport randomly?
faqList.answer: High ping or lag can make your hero do unexpected magic tricks. Strong internet + good device = no accidental teleporting.
